Here's how you can use this the Calculator class:
```python
calculator = Calculator()
result = calculator.add(2)
print(result)  # Should print 2

result = calculator.subtract(1)
print(result)  # Should print 1

result = calculator.multiply(3)
print(result)  # Should print 3

result = calculator.divide(2)
print(result)  # Should print 1.5

result = calculator.nth_root(2)
print(result)  # Should print 1.224744871391589

result = calculator.reset()
print(result)  # Should print 0
```
